courseDescription:
This course lays out the fundamentals of Adobe Photoshop before exploring its more complex features. We aim to keep things simple and take you from novice to expert step by step. Even if you're just getting started, you'll be amazed at how simple but powerful Photoshop can be, which is why it remains one of the world’s most popular programs with a wide range of uses. Whether you're trying to jumpstart your creative career or add a new skill to your toolkit, now is the time to sign up for this course. We begin with an introduction to the program and move through Photoshop’s interface until you can employ its sophisticated transforming, wrapping and image-editing features.

The course then explores ways to help you work more efficiently in Photoshop, starting with keyboard shortcuts that you can customize along with the program’s interface. We then examine the important concept of ‘layers’ in Photoshop before moving on to more powerful tools and features: warping, compositing, retouching image adjustments and colour-correction filters, adding text and vector shapes, camera, raw footage and even video in 3D. We demonstrate the use of such features to make you an expert as you tackle more advanced projects. Ideally, you should have Photoshop on your computer while taking this course so you can follow all the examples and mini-projects we provide while you learn.

We guide you through Photoshop's popular techniques for retouching portrait photography via frequency separation as we tackle various creative projects to demonstrate how to use advanced features like masking, painting, blending and compositing multiple images and much more. This course covers all the features you need to master to become a capable graphic designer. We then investigate Photoshop documents and explain how to create and navigate them while providing tips and tricks to allow you to open them faster. We conclude the course with an overview of digital images, which you require before diving into advanced image editing. Photoshop is used industry-wide because of its versatility and power to shape the visual world, so sign up for this diploma course to enrich your resume and skills.

modules.name: Module
modules.description: Adobe Photoshop is a graphics editing tool (also known as image editing software) that lets you create and manipulate visual images on your computer. In this module, we'll begin with the basics we'll walk you through Photoshop's interface, you get to work with Photoshop documents, and you will understand what digital images are.

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module, we'll learn about some of the most common utilities you'll need to know in Photoshop. We'll learn how to use rulers and guides, we'll see them in action as we walk through a mini project to slice up multiple images and export them. We'll also learn how to use grid-snapping tools.

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module, we introduce you to smart objects. We'll start by explaining what smart objects are and why it's beneficial to use them. From there, you'll learn how to create them and how to edit them. And lastly, you'll learn how to open images as smart objects.

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module, we'll learn about Photoshops Sky Replacement feature. This tool is intended to replace blown-out or unappealing skies from images with more sharp and appropriate alternatives, as well as make tweaks to the rest of the image to give it a more authentic feel.

modules.description: In this module, we cover the core fundamentals of working in-camera Raw. We'll start by understanding why raw images are so important. Then we'll jump into Photoshop to see the special interface that Photoshop has for editing raw images. From there, we'll learn how Photoshop saves our Raw edits and how to apply the Camera Raw filter to images.
